Amazon Associates

Earn commissions by recommending products you use.

⏱ 1-2 Months⚠️ Risk: Low

Action Plan

  • 1.Sign up at affiliate-program.amazon.com
  • 2.Create a 'Kit' or list of gear you actually use
  • 3.Add the disclaimer 'As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases' to your descriptions
  • 4.Paste links in your pinned comment and description

Common Mistakes

  • •Posting links without a disclaimer (Illegal)
  • •Asking friends to click your links (Ban risk)
  • •Linking to products you haven't mentioned in the video

Example Content

"Top 5 Gadgets I Actually Use"

Create a video solving a problem using the product. Don't just sell it, show how it helps.

Compliance Note

Always verbally say "This video contains affiliate links" or use the YouTube "Paid Promotion" checkbox.

Ready to apply?

If you meet the requirements, start today.
